src:
Sejam Sebelum Kongres, Benhard Limbong Mundur dari Caketum PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 10:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bernhard Limbong menyatakan mundur dari bursa pencalonan ketua umum (ketum) PSSI periode 2019-2023. Dia menarik diri sejam sebelum Kongres Pemilihan dimulai di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019) pagi WIB.
Kepada awak media, mantan ketua komisi disiplin (komdis) PSSI ini mengungkapkan alasannya mundur. Dia mengaku sibuk.
"Per hari ini mundur dari bursa pencalonan Ketum PSSI. Saya kira, saya tidak punya waktu karena saya sibuk," ujar Limbong.
"Dengan waktu saya yang sekarang, saya tidak bisa untuk terlibat aktif di PSSI," katanya menambahkan.

text:
An hour before Congress, Benhard Limbong Resigned from PSSI Caketum
02 Nov 2019, 10:38 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bernhard Limbong has resigned from the PSSI general chairman's candidacy for the 2019-2023 period. He withdrew an hour before the Election Congress began at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019) morning WIB.
To the media crew, the former chairman of the PSSI disciplinary commission revealed his reasons for withdrawing. He claimed to be busy.
"As of today I resign from the Ketum PSSI nomination exchange. I don't think I have time because I'm busy," Limbong said.
"With my current time, I cannot get actively involved in PSSI," he added.
